name: You-chromeplete-amazon
tagline: Chrome extension for easy Amazon product review search on YouTube
body:
### What is it?
You-Complete-Amazon is a Chrome extension that adds a button to Amazon product
pages. Clicking on the button searches YouTube for product reviews.

### What does it look like?
![screenshot](http://ncliang.github.io/you-chromeplete-amazon/images/screenshot.png)

### How to install?
1. Type "chrome://extensions" in Chrome browser bar
2. Check "Developer mode"
3. Click on button "Load unpacked extension..."
4. Select location of manifest.json and other files
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
